snippet.title: Smiley's Revenge
snippet.description:
A brief description of my game, Smiley's Revenge:

It's essentially about a post apocalyptic world, after the super volcanoes of Earth all erupt and explode, leaving only 7 islands left, all connected in some way. A scientist named Orion, developed an everlasting energy resource

for each individual island, but before it could be dispersed, his partner, nicknamed "Smiley" bc he was always smiling, lol, decided to take it for his own, and kill off Dr Orion. Well, before that could happen, Dr Orion sealed off all energy resources from Smiley, in 6

different bio-organic orbs. These orbs, eventually evolve into biomechanical beings, and as the game starts, you choose which orb to start out as
